property.description: Well presented 3 bedroom detached family home. Situated in a cul de sac position on the established and well sought after Rutland Heights development. Accommodation in brief: Hallway (4.17m x 2.13m approx) with wooden laminate flooring and stairs to first floor. Lounge (3.66m x 4.44m approx) with window to front aspect and open plan to the dining room. Dining room (3.71m x 3.07m approx) with French doors leading to the Conservatory (3.89m x 3.07m approx) - uPVC construction with wood effect laminate flooring and French doors leading to read garden. Kitchen (3.86m x 2.77m approx) - L shaped kitchen with range of light wood base units, drawers and matching wall units above, tiled floor, integrated freezer, fridge and microwave oven and window to rear aspect and open plan to the breakfast area. Breakfast area (2.64m x 2.18m approx) with tiled floor and window to rear aspect. Utility room (1.88m x 2.24m approx) tiled floor, plumbing for washing machine, window to side and door to rear garden and access through to garage. Downstairs cloakroom (1.6m x 1.85m approx) low level WC and wash hand basin with tiled floor and heated towel rail. Office/Storage area (2.59m x 1.63m approx) the rear section of the garage has been converted into an office/storage area with wood effect laminate flooring and access through to Garage (3.33m x 2.69m approx) the remainder of the garage has a part concrete floor and part raised wood effect laminate floor, up and over door. First floor landing, window and airing cupboard with storage. Bedroom one (3.96m x 3.51m approx) with wooden effect laminate flooring, built in wardrobes and storage cupboards, window to front aspect. En suite with double shower cubicle, low level WC and pedestal wash hand basing, tiled walls, window and heated towel rail. Bedroom two (3.1m x 3.48m approx) double room with window overlooking open fields to the rear. Bedroom three with window to front aspect. Bathroom (1.68m x 2.31m approx) three piece suite of bath with shower attachment, low level WC and pedestal wash hand basin , half tiled walls and window. Outside to the front there a gravel driveway with off-road parking, lawn with trees and borders, footpath leading to the front door. The fully enclosed rear garden is mainly lawn with borders and shrubs, slabbed patio area, decked steps to rear grassed area with open field views. uPVC double glazing, gas central heating, South Kesteven District Council Band D, Unfurnished. Sorry, no pets permitted. EPC: D/55
